Trade/Device Name(s): BD ProbeTec Neisseria gonorrhoeae (GC) Qx Amplified DNA Assay
Regulation Name(s): Neisseria spp. direct serological test reagents
Specimen Type(s): Gynecological specimens in BD SurePath Preservative Fluid
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD ProbeTec Neisseria gonorrhoeae (GC) Qx Amplified DNA Assay for qualitative detection of Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA using SDA technology on BD Viper LT System
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA in various clinician- and patient-collected urogenital swab and urine specimens, as well as gynecological specimens in BD SurePath or PreservCyt fluids, to aid in diagnosis of gonococcal urogenital disease in asymptomatic and symptomatic individuals
